statements: DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 100 AND stock_level < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ' AND JSON_EXTRACT(demand_data, '$.priority') = 'high';
DELETE FROM demand_data WHERE demand_quantity > 100 AND product_id = 2
DELETE FROM InventoryAnalysis WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 10 AND product_name = 'Widget A';
DELETE FROM inventory_analysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-01-01' AND restock_recommendation = 'Urgent Restock';
DELETE FROM StockLevels WHERE current_stock < restock_level;
DELETE FROM InventoryData WHERE id = 100 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM StockLevels WHERE current_stock <= 50 AND restock_level > 20;
